sentences.en: A promotion to head of News Corp.'s music division.
sentences.cn: 他被提升为新闻集团音乐部门的主管.

sentences.en: After acquiring Warner Industries, stock in Acme Corp. went up by 12 %.
sentences.cn: 并购华纳企业之后, 艾克米公司的股票上涨了百分之十二.

sentences.en: But joining the Marine Corp's the best thing that ever happened to me.
sentences.cn: 但加入海军是我所做的最好的事情.

sentences.en: Directors and CEO's can now set their corp standing towards themselves.
sentences.cn: 主管和CEO现在可以设置军团对他们自己的声望.

sentences.en: Ethernet: Telecommunications networking protocol introduced by Xerox Corp. in 1979.
sentences.cn: 以太网络: 1979年全录公司提出的远程通讯网路协议.

sentences.en: I suppose the United Trading Corp. has reserved the room for me.
sentences.cn: 我想是联合贸易公司代我订的房间.

sentences.en: Includes profile, products, news , and research. - Probelt Industrial Corp.
sentences.cn: 包括个人资料, 产品, 新闻和研究.

sentences.en: Shares of News Corp were flat in extended trading.
sentences.cn: 新闻集团的股价在收市后交易中持平.

sentences.en: Since 2001, shanghai latex factory is merged into CHINA UNITED RUBBER ( GROUP ) CORP.
sentences.cn: 2001年, 上海乳胶厂并入中联橡胶 ( 集团 ) 总公司.

sentences.en: Steel Corp. and ArcelorMittal likely will see further erosion in steel sales.

sentences.en: The collector - distributor control system of Symphony Rack DCS of ABB Corp.
sentences.cn: ABB公司的SymphonyRackDCS集散控制系统 是首钢电力厂主要采用的控制系统.该系统具有开放、友好和稳定的特点.

sentences.en: The name of our company will be changed to ( Colombian Corp. ).
sentences.cn: 我们公司的名称更名为哥伦比亚公司.

sentences.en: They used cash from South Africa's Rembrandt Tobacco Corp. to buy brands.
sentences.cn: 他们利用南非的伦勃朗烟草公司的现金购买商标.

sentences.en: You can also have Zope Corp. build your Zope site for you.
sentences.cn: 你还能让Zope公司来给你建立你的Zope站点.
